The EventType class represents an event type.

getPriority

public int getPriority()
Returns the priority of this event type. The range is 1 to 10, with 1 being the highest priority.

public java.lang.String[] getTags()
Deprecated. Use tags.conf.spec file to assign tags to groups of events with related field values. Returns the list of tags for this event type.

setDescription

public void setDescription(java.lang.String description)

Parameters:

setDisabled

public void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
Sets whether the event type is enabled or disabled.

Note: Using this method requires you to restart Splunk before this setting takes effect. To avoid restarting Splunk, use the Entity.disable and Entity.enable methods instead, which take effect immediately.

See Also:
Entity.disable(), Entity.enable()

setPriority

public void setPriority(int priority)
Sets the priority of the event type. Valid values are from 1 to 10, with 1 being the highest priority.

Parameters:
priority - The priority of the event type.

setSearch

public void setSearch(java.lang.String search)
Sets the search string.

Parameters:
